messages.USER_WITH_PHONE_ALREADY_EXISTS: user with this phone number already exists
messages.CLUB_ALREADY_EXISTS: club with this name already exists

messages.start: Hello {firstName}! I am a registration bot for club '{clubName}'. Please, send me your contact to proceed.
messages.invalidStart: Hello {firstName}! To start the process, please, send me message like this: /start 'club_id'
messages.noClub: Sorry, I can't find club with id '{clubId}'. Please, try again!
messages.noPhoneNumber: There is no phone number in your credentials. Please write it by yourself.
messages.invalidPhoneNumber: '{phone}' is not a valid phone number. Try again!
messages.welcomeBackVeteran:
Welcome back to club '{clubName}', {firstName}!
Your clubs are:
messages.registeredInSystem:
Welcome back to system, {firstName}!
I am going to register you to '{clubName}'!
messages.credentials:
So, your credentials are: 
First name: {firstName}, 
Last name: {lastName}, 
Phone number: {phone}. 
Right?
messages.register:
Thank you for your registration!
Your club is '{clubName}'.
messages.assignToClub:
Thank you for your registration to '{clubName}'!
Now your clubs are:
messages.name: Send me your 'Firstname Lastname'!

errors.error: Something went wrong... Please, try again!
errors.phoneValidationError: Sorry, I failed validating your phone number... Please, try again!
errors.registrationError: Sorry, I failed registering you... Please, try again!
